title: First Stakeholder Committee meeting of GuideRadPROS
content: The first Stakeholder Committee meeting was held in a virtual platform on the 27th February 2024. The agenda of the meeting included an introduction of the project, presentations of stakeholders and a discussion with feedback for the progress of the project consortium.

title: GuideRadPROS technical visit
content: Short technical visit to the x-ray laboratories of ENEA (Casaccia, Italy) in order to do spectrometry of ISO 4037 standard x-ray beam qualities.

title: M9 GuideRadPROS meeting
content: The M9 meeting of the 22NRM07 GuideRadPROS Project was held in Italy at Ospedale Bambino Gesù (Rome).

title: 1st kick off meeting of GuideRadPROS Consortium
content: The 1st meeting of the EURAMET EMP 22NRM07 GuideRadPROS Consortium took place in Finland at STUK (Vantaa).

title: First online workshop
content: The first workshop of the GuideRadPROS ProjectEURAMET will be held online and it will last 2 days. The goal of the workshop is to test the developed theoretical training material on ISO 4037:2019 and ISO 29661. See the workshop flyer for more information. To register for the workshop, please fill out this registration form. Check the workshop timetable. Here you can find the links to the workshop sessions.

title: M18 GuideRadPROS meeting
content: The M18 meeting of the 22NRM07 GuideRadPROS Project was held in Finland at STUK (Vantaa).

title: M18 GuideRadPROS technical visit
content: On-site technical visit to the facilities of Mirion Technologies (Turku, Finland), a company that develops and manufactures gamma dosimeters.

title: Practical training course on ISO 4037
content: The workshop will focus on "Calibrating photon dosimeters to ISO 4037 standards and preparing for new radiation protection quantities". It will be held in Athens (Greece) and it will last 3 days. It will comprise three days of lectures and discussions, followed by hands-on sessions, where participants will be divided into basic and advanced groups. See more details here.

title: Technical visit of PTB at CMI
content: One-day meeting of PTB (Physikalisch-Technische Bundesanstalt, Germany) partners at CMI (Czech Metrology Institute, Czechia). It was dedicated to the discussion about in-beam spectrometry of X-ray calibration beams and further steps in the related activities in the project.

title: Technical visit of CMI at PTB
content: Four-day visit of CMI (Czech Metrology Institute, Czechia) partners to PTB (Physikalisch-Technische Bundesanstalt, Germany) . The partners carried out measurements of photon fluence spectra of reference X-ray beams, tested the spectrometric detector settings and performance, and obtained data for further use of the spectrometer as an instrument for determination of high voltage on the X-ray tube.

title: Technical visit of CMI at STUK
content: Five-day visit of CMI (Czech Metrology Institute, Czechia) partners to STUK (Radiation and Nuclear Safety Authority, Finland) photon dosimetry facility. The partners carried out measurements of photon fluence spectra of two industrial Am-241 radionuclide sources. In the calibration facility dedicated for measurements in X-ray beams, the partners measured photon fluence spectra of reference X-ray radiation qualities.

title: Technical visit of INM at VINS
content: Visit of INM (National Institute of Metrology, Republic of Moldova) partners at VINS (Vinča Institute of Nuclear Sciences, Serbia) on September 2023. The partners worked on the Dissemination, communication and exploitation plan. They also worked in activities related to dosimeters type testing, focusing on how to establish reference values and validate capabilities and how to characterize the fields.

title: Technical visit of QST at PTB
content: Visit of QST (National Institutes for Quantum Science and Technology, Japan) partners at PTB (Physikalisch-Technische Bundesanstalt, Germany) September 2024. The partners discussed how to test current dosimeters used in pulsed X-ray fields in Japan and how to test the applicability of IEC 63050.
